attributes.action: Ban single use plastic in stores and online purchasing in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
I am a 12 year old girl, but I still know we need a change. When the last tree is cut and the last river is poisoned you will realise that you can’t eat money. Even if you don’t cut trees, do not support it. Start a petition, a strike ETC. Anything to save the planet. Anyone who does anything to save the world - like David Attenborough - is more important than any superpower or superhero. He is a man that without superpowers, cares. He will not even live to see the devastating effect. 
India
attributes.background: I know that there are ways to eliminate single use plastics, we just need people who care to save our planet, and therefore - the future of humanity.
